data.name: Movies
data.title: Movies
data.description: Watching movie is my best way to spend my leisure time. It can refresh my mind. I am huge fan of Marvel Cinematic. Ironman,Thor and Captain America are my favourites. I like to watch Action,Fictional,Sci-Fi and Comedy movies. Apart from movies I loves Web series also Like GOT,Big Bang Theory,Friends,Money Heist,Family Man,Sacred Games and so on.

data.name: Music
data.title: Music
data.description: I love to listen Bollywood songs of A.R. Rahman,Mohit Chauhan,Arijit Sing,Jubin Nautiyal, Neha kakkar, Shreya Ghoshal. Sometime I listen Old song of Kishor Kumar and other songs also.

data.name: Photography
data.title: Photography
data.description: I always Like to capture the nature like Sunrise, Sunset, Sky Shades, Birds and moments with friends and family sometimes I do trekking with friend near pune and click some photos

data.name: Foody
data.title: Foody
data.description: I like Wadapav, extremly love love with chicken food. Sometimes I cook chicken food, not a good chef but friends says they like chicken cooked by me 😜. Love dishes like Puran Poli,Kande-baji,Msala Dosa,Panipuri,Jalebi,and so on.
